website_summaries.verdict: A versatile UV protection shirt that you can wear in several ways, depending on what fits your style.
pros: Adjustable ruching enables you to adjust the shirt's length
cons: You must hand wash it without laundry detergent, otherwise you will destroy the UV protection layer

customer_reviews.title: Get your own size!
customer_reviews.text: I love it but went with other reviewers saying sizing was small, I ordered a medium (even though I usually wear a small) because I was leaving in a couple days and only had 1 shot to get it right... My suggestion... Get your own size! It ended up being looser than what I wanted for a swim shirt (especially in the arms). Material is nice but too warm for Hawaii just to wear around unless you get wet. Color as pictured. On the day I took the pics, I weighed 136lbs. I am 5'5, pear shaped / B cup.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G

customer_reviews.title: The quality is amazing, feels good on. I love how it can be a dress or a shirt. Can't wait to wear it at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size M, I weigh 144 lb, I'm 5'3, and the medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's flattering and fits great
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's flattering and fits great. I ordered the large. I'm usually a size 12. Its snug but still a little loose around the arms so it's a perfect fit! I debated between the large and the x-large and I'm definitely glad I wen with the smaller one. Can't wait to wear it boating! I live in FL so I need serious sun protection. This was a good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and snug on arms.
customer_reviews.text: This fits great. The zipper falls at the perfect place. If it is zipped all the way up, I can see that it poses the potential to be a bit scratchy. It looks great pulled up on sides or worn long. I have yet to put it to the test in the water. I also ordered a medium because I wanted it to fit tight on my arms. I have loose skin on my arms from a 200 pound weight loss and wanted to camouflage it. This shirt does the job perfectly. The medium fits me and I am 5'6", 170 lbs, with larger arms and tummy due to loose skin.
customer_reviews.author: Voluptuouslyskinny

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Top. Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say that I am in LOVE with this top. I'm 5'3", 158 lbs. Size Medium/yellow fit perfectly. No bleeding, outstanding quality. I wore it everyday all day for a full week on vacation at the Frio River, Texas. It was sunny and hot! I just laid it out on the picnic table to dry overnight each day. No problems. Back home now and just washed it and its hanging up to dry now. Did great out of the washing machine/cold water etc.. Highly recommend. Plan to purchase other colors.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I'm 5'7" 155 lbs and I ordered M. I wanted it to be fitted and it's perfect. l LOVE that I can adjust the length. It's a nice thickness, quality feeling but not too heavy. The purple is sick a pretty color. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, really love the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I gave it 5 stars because I was happy that it came on time and looks great. I love the zipper in the front also and that you can make it the length you want. I am 5'6, 142lbs and got a large because I didn't want it to be really tight. If you want a more snug fit then I would just order your correct size. Without the string pulled it goes just below my cheeks almost like a mini dress. I will probably pull the strings a bit but we will see. I like that I can do either. I'll try and post some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sketo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent top!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a maternity swim top to stop the heat rash problems I was experiencing. This top has been amazing - very quick drying and fashionable! I normally wear Small tops but went with a Large to accommodate future growth (purchased at 19wks, 2nd baby). Highly recommend this to all - pregnant or not!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Tall with long torso and this fits well
customer_reviews.text: So I’m 5’9’’ and when I was in my 20s at about 140 I’d buy something like this thinking I could pull it off just as well as the model in the picture. That’s not the case now at 38, 170lbs and two kids later, and I'm often super disappointed when I buy clothes online! However, I was pleasantly surprised by the fit of this. I bought a medium. I’m one of those tall people with short legs but long torso and this did the trick. Here’s a pic. I'm a 36C btw and the cut is very flattering 'there'.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Me

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying more colors!
customer_reviews.text: Wish i wouldve gotten this sooner! It would have saved me from a few bad burns. I love it! Certainly does the job and is also super cute and comfy. I usually wear a Medium and based off of previous reviews I purchased a Large. Perfect fit! The pink color is bright and pretty! Its very slimming as well:). Yes it can be pulled down into a “dress” but for me this just barely covers my butt. It is short as a dress fyi! It washes up really well and dries very fast. Nice in the Florida sun without being hot! Stays nice and cool. I will be buying in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rashguard and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this rash guard. It's not only comfortable but it's also really cute which is a plus! I love the scrunching on the side of it and the fact that you can change the length. It holds up well in tbe water when swimming and it does not make me feel restricted in terms of movement. So far it has kept me safe from the burning sun and I like having it as an option to wear if I'm outside for long periods of time! Also, I am a size 12/14 and I got a large. Fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RoxiePoxie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This might be the first summer camp with toddlers in the pool that I feel attractive without being revealing. It looks really great and I don't have to apply susnscreen all day.
customer_reviews.author: Megan ferricane

customer_reviews.title: Fit and color is so nice, and you cant beat this top-to-dress versitility
customer_reviews.text: Fit and color is so nice, and you cant beat this top-to-dress versatility! Got it in both black and pink. Im 5’5 150lbs pear shaped. Originally ordered a size large since I’m hippy but that was way too big and loose on my little waist. Returned and ordered Smalls and they fit me perfect now, not loose, hugging my curves as I like. I would say these are cut a bit large. Looking forward to using this at the adventure park in Mexico along with some water leggings, also while traveling through South East Asia this winter. Hope it indeed protects me from sun and gives an extra layer to protect from bug bites
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirlNYCTop Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this terrified that the sizing would be wrong. If you Go by the sizing shart it should be good. I weigh 143 and am 5'4" and I ordered a medium. I can see my "belly bubble alittle " . And remember this is a swimming outfit not lose cotton shirt. It fits wonderfully. The arms are only a little long but that is no issue i pull them down anyway and hide my hands from the sun. It dries fast and works wonderfully i am going to order a purple next
customer_reviews.author: jea

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting. I immediately ran into the shower
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. When I opened the package it smelled a little mildewy but I figured it was sitting in a warehouse, not uncommon. I tried it on and when I took it off I could see the inside was covered in white mold spots, even in the sleeves. Disgusting. I immediately ran into the shower. At this moment I am itchy and sneezing, no surprise since I am allergic to mold. I order clothing online all the time and have never had this happen. I am upset and really grossed out. I put gloves on and took pictures. you can even see some tiny green spots forming.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, versatile, PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this top so much. It fits great, is flattering, and super comfortable. I burn like a marshmallow, and this protected me for a full week on the water in Greece. It's really easy to sinch up to a shirt or unsinch to a dress length. The chest part is cute and versatile, too. I felt stylish and comfortable and use it every time I'm in the water now. It's breathable, too, so I never felt hot or sweaty. I'll be buying one in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Jen GSD

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful and beautiful swimwear accessory.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic piece. My wife doe not like to go bare midriff, but had some cute swim bottoms and sports bras that she wanted to use on our vacation. This worked perfectly to accommodate that and looked really good one her. Also she has very fair skin, so the SPF 50 protection all over her arms, shoulders and torso was a huge plus. HIGHLY recommend for anyone looking for a rash guard that is attractive and has a lot of versatility.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty swim top
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute swim top. I bought an XXS thinking it was XXL, whoops! It is very nice material, thick, long lasting. I wanted sides that came down past my tummy. My daughter took one look at it and wouldn't wear any other swim top this summer. It looked terrific on her. She's 10 and XXS fit her nicely. It was long on her, but as far as sun protection goes, I'll take it. It would go down to her thighs, so no burned backs from the shirt crawling up on her. It looks dressy. It is a good quality, well made. I only wish it came in XXL so I could have one too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Weberg

customer_reviews.title: Just like an Athleta rash guard but half the pride
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5, 145 pounds, with 36C chest and bought the large size. I LOVE this top! I have two Athleta rash guards very similar to this, which I always got compliments on. Athleta doesn't make them anymore so it was great to find a cheaper but high-quality substitute. I wear it as a short dress over my swimsuit because I have sun sensitivity issues. The material is very substantial. The purple color is more of a magenta but very rich and flattering. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Jkim27

customer_reviews.title: not recommended for  sun -protection, quality,& Durability
customer_reviews.text: I found the product not to be very functional. I purchased 2 and return one due hole in inseam Poor sun protection and see through. not designed for the water -Wrist l are extremely wine & impeds movement- Cute cut and colors but not worth the money. Purchase because it was cheaper than the well-known surf/scuba brands. Unable to return the second one and regretted buying.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: It's now almost the end of summer so I feel I've tested this enough. It's been great! The fit is just as expected maybe a tad on the big side but nothing crazy. The sleeves are a little long but I've read that about most rash guards so maybe it's a thing I'm missing? It's not lined, so I wear something under. I've just worn this over the weekend to a water park. It was comfy and stayed well fitted the whole day. It helped to keep me cool in 92* weather. I recommend 100%!
customer_reviews.author: TT_22

customer_reviews.title: Consider sizing up depending body type
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. The sizing seems a bit off. I’m 5’5”, 145lbs, 34DD, size m tops, 8 dress size. I normally would order medium but after reading reviews I decided to size up. That was the right choice L fits perfectly. Medium I think would have been too tight. I haven’t worn it out yet so I don’t have a sun/heat review for the material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shirt, although it was a little big. I am 5'8" 140lbs and I had originally ordered a large but once I tried it on I realized I needed a smaller size. I ordered a medium and it seemed to fit fine but the shirt became slightly baggy once I got in the water. Overall I liked the fit and quality of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this rashguard.Fits great I have a suit the same color and it looks great together. We have cold lakes in Wisconsin so this is perfect to keep me warm and protect my skin from the sun. I swim with my dog and sometimes he scratches me so this is the perfect outfit. A neighbor liked it so much I bought one for her. I am a size 10. 5'4" @145 lbs and a large fits great love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rae

customer_reviews.title: This is a very comfortable and versatile swim top.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for casual swimming as well as swim lessons/laps. I am 5'2' and ~140 lbs and ordered a large. It is roomy but not too big. Opaque, not see through at all. Zipper is great for getting on and off. I wear a wireless bra rather than a bikini top underneath for full support, and zip it all the way up while swimming. The overall length without tying up the sides comes down to upper mid thigh, but I prefer to tie up sides to hip level, and wear with a swim 'skort'.
customer_reviews.author: K.Carb

customer_reviews.title: Better than i could have expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5foot and 130 lbs and the medium fit perfectly. Its exactly what I needed. It kept me sheltered from the sun and was great to swim in. I thought the sleeves might ride up but they stayed in place. I would definitely recommend this to anyone. Great quality material for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Conn

customer_reviews.title: Very flattering and fits TTS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the dark pink (rose) color in a size M and am thrilled with the quality and fit! For reference I have an hourglass shape, 5’5” and 145 lbs. Normally size S/M in tops and 4-6/M in bottoms. Extending this to dress length wasn’t a good look on me but I love it as a top and it’s nice that the length is adjustable. The size M was form fitting but not too tight, just as I like my rashguard tops to fit. Now to look for more colors!
customer_reviews.author: goboilers05

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great and very cute cut, but I bought in advance of a trip and when it finally rolled around I realized one string tie had become unraveled just from my trying on several times. I haven't even worn or washed it. This was my second purchase of this item and the first, bought from different seller, I returned after finding the stitching on the side holding the strings had come undone. It's too bad because otherwise it feels like quality material that would normally hold up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 2 of these and they are fantastic! I normally would get a size small in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and they are fantastic! I normally would get a size small in a rash guard and they fit perfect in a sizs small in this brand. They are a snugger fit than my other brands, but that is the style/fabric. They are really long, so can accommodate a lot of torso lengths, but the sides tie up for ruching so you can adjust to whatever length you want. The zipper on the front makes it easy to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, not right for my shape/needs.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really fit my body well. I'm 36" bust 28" waist and 35" hip. The bust was tight (like the model in the picture) and the waist/hip area was really, really loose. It would not work for swimming as I want my top to be skin tight so it doesn't ride up in the water or get weighed down. Might work better for people with more hips or those want to hide a pooch. Quality and color was nice, no defects or ruined fabric like others mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hulstein

customer_reviews.title: I love the the length and fit of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the the length and fit of this! The arms are a tad long, but can easily be folded or used to cover hands if needed. I love that the length can be adjusted. My pic reflects it at max lenght. I have a bit of a "bottom", so i love that it covers it and where it falls. Can't wait to get in the water with it. I am 5'2", 148, between a 10-12 size.
customer_reviews.author: bobbi A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this rash guard. I'm 5'6 136lbs 34/28/38 and I ordered the small. It fit well, not too tight or too loose. I wore this all day for 2 days at a water park in mid 90 degree sunny weather and did not get burned so it works. It is very hot until you get wet and then I was comfortable so I wouldn't recommend it for hiking or general shirt. But as a rash guard in the water it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Kosack

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!
customer_reviews.text: This rash guard worked perfectly at the beaches in the Outer Banks, NC and I received many compliments! I’m a 6-8 and ordered the aqua in Medium to go with my black and navy suits. It fit as expected - a little loose in arms and stomach when pulled up into a shirt. There are no built in cups, but it was very comfortable over a bathing suit top. I also wore as a dress to walk the beach at night and it was still comfortable with undergarments.
customer_reviews.author: LMinIL

customer_reviews.title: Good, but seams are weak and rip
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7", 123lbs, size 4/6 about a 36C or 34D and purchased a medium. Fitting in the bust but fits everywhere else. I really liked the color and the optional lengths of this rash guard but only gave 4 stars as my shirt ripped at the side seam on the first day so I was a little bummed about that. It is an easy solution to tack but....honestly first day.....I will still keep and use and it is have the price of other I have seen locally so an easy stitch is fine. Hopefully that is just it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. The whole point of this is its long, super cute with side cinch, plus the zipper is so necessary because I hate pulling tight surf shirts over my head, plus nice to unzip after a long swim but not have to take off. The cinch was good to keep it from floating into my face during long snorkels and long enough to cover my butt (I'm 5') so I didn't burn my bikini line. I loved the white but super annoying once I stained it somehow. Haven't figured out how to get stain off. Spray n wash not working.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this, but I couldn't imagine being encased in ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but I couldn't imagine being encased in it while immersed in water. It felt like I might sweat to death. I have broad shoulders and large bust. It fit in the shoulders but was way too tight in the bust. I think this piece (in an XL) was made for a tall broad-shouldered athletic woman with little boobage. If that's you and you don't mind a LOT of coverage, you'll love it. I just wanted not to burn so I bought some SPF 50 and returned this.
customer_reviews.author: JoanGW

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute, offers a lot of coverage
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is perfect for sun protection. It can be worn as a shirt, with the sides scrunch up along the ties, or as a short dress, with the side pulled down. Either way it looks super cute. The aqua blue color is vibrant and summery but the shirt could be worn even into the fall. If is really does provide 50 spf and it never washes out it is perfect for those who are super sensitive to the sun but still want to stay cool.
customer_reviews.author: KItkatquiero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rash Guard!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome swim shirt! Very well made and extremely flattering. It fits well if a tiny bit loose; I was really happy that the sleeves and the torso are pretty long since I'm tall. Haven't tested it in the sun since I sent it back to exchange for a different color, but it looks like it will last a long time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: great rash guard
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7", 115 lbs. I usually wear S, sometimes XS. I got this in XS and it fits great. Not too tight to put on when it's hot outside, but tight enough to look good. It protected me from the hot Caribbean sun on the beach and in the water, but it was fine to wear as a top in the town as well. It looks very cute and it's nice that you can wear it as a (very) short dress on the beach as well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. Material is very breathable not hot. With the zipper it's easy to take off when wet. I like that I can adjust the length. I'm 5'2", 36 in the bust, 28in the waist and 37 in the hips. Weigh115. Ordered the medium. Not real snug but diffently not loose. I highly recommend this rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: It also helped keep me cool as it stays damp for a while
customer_reviews.text: I wore this starting on day 2 of a 7day vacation. Sunscreen had failed and I had a sunburn- the shirt felt silky on the sunburn and allowed it to heal while I played in the sun. It also helped keep me cool as it stays damp for a while. The style is complementary and hides imperfections well with the length cinched up a bit. It keeps its shape well when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I get sun position super easy so I’m forced to wear these things. I will say this one is by far my favorite. I love the fit, it is meant to be tight so if you don’t really want a super tight fit I would size up. I love how you can choose how sinched you want the sides! It is worth the money you spend on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained easily by sunblock.
customer_reviews.text: Material got stained by the sunblock Needs to be sized up but that’s not the reason for 3 stars. There seems to be a problem with the material which seems to get these dark grey stains spot out of no where the first time I wore it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: marie joseph

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a lot of fabric bunched together but is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3", 118lbs got sz M. Length comes down to mid thigh when fully down but can be scrunched up to above waist. Seems like a lot of fabric bunched together but is comfortable. Very flattering on. Hides any added weight in the belly while accentuating a curvy waist. Protected my skin from sun burn when snorkeling all day in the ocean. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: surfgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love this swimming shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this swimming shirt. It's the only rash guard shirt I've been able to find that's feminine and pretty, and I plan to use it also as a swimsuit cover-up for the suit I have that's a bikini top with a swim skirt. It can be worn longer if you don't pull in the drawstrings. It fits like a regular shirt, not skin tight like most swim shirts. I'm looking forward to wearing it on my vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Eyton

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this swim shirt! It does fit a little small, so I would suggest ordering a size larger than what you normally wear, but it's very comfortable, well-made, stylish, and the protection can't be beat. What more could you ask for? I'm so pleased with my purchase I have passed the product details on to several friends! I bought it in the magenta color and it's beautiful! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen G

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’m 5’0” and 105 lbs. the xs fits perfectly expect in the busy because I’m a C. I usually wear this like a dress but like that the length is adjustable. Also like the thickness. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"5 tall, 140 lb, waist 32. I bought it in white color for canoeing trip, very comfortable, fit perfectly, I got lots of compliments. Little bit tight in my bust, but it's ok, my Victoria secret bra size is 36D.
customer_reviews.author: SergeS

customer_reviews.title: love it, but it's very long
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this shirt. However, it is very, VERY long. Much longer than it looks in the picture. I am 5'8" and 112 lbs, so I ordered the small and it is little baggy on me. I probably would order an XS if I ordered again. Material is very sturdy and silky feeling. I'm very happy with this purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jones

customer_reviews.title: but I don't like my shirts to be completely skin tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm generally a Medium, but on the larger side of it, so I went with a large and I don't regret it. It fits perfectly for me, not overly tight or overly loose. I think I'd have fit in a Medium, but I don't like my shirts to be completely skin tight. Not only is this shirt saving me from sunburn (being very pale and very tattooed, this is a big concern for me) but it actually keeps me way cooler than anything else I've ever worn! Totally saving my life on lawn-mowing days and outdoor events this hot summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great top-careful with size-feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I received compliments on this shirt-it's very attractive just with jeans or shorts and isn't an obvious water shirt. The material feels great and I just mix it with my other laundry. The laces to gather the sides are extremely long but I just tuck those in. Shirt fits as their size chart says so look before you pick a size.
customer_reviews.author: Belali

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today, tried it on and it fits well. I'm 5'2 175 lbs 34 around torso but 43 around bust. Fits well, just right (on dry land). Will update after used in water. Thus far, I recommend it. Shipping to San Diego was next day. Love the bright pink. Opting for coverage instead of sunscreen to help protect corals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Light weight and flattering
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Light weight and flattering. The only down side was the zipper was a little itchy. However, it is a great option to have a zipper since it is hot on the beach, but you also want coverage. Brought this to Maui and was very happy with it. Color was great. Also, I have very sensitive skin, so the zipper might not bother other people. I can't even wear necklaces due to sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Codette

customer_reviews.title: and it feels supportive and comfortable. I like the drawstrings - I'm self-conscious of ...
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a rash guard, it is expected that this should be tight fitting. I just bought this for my upcoming trip to Hawaii, so I haven't used it yet, but the quality is spectacular. It's not too thick and not too thin, and it feels supportive and comfortable. I like the drawstrings - I'm self-conscious of my midsection, so I got a black, and the black mixed with the supportive fabric and the drawstrings make it very flattering!
customer_reviews.author: linhart

customer_reviews.title: Great but a hole after one use!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of this shirt. The tunic style is great. You can practically wear it as a dress. Great for at the pool. But after one time wearing it my husband came home and said "what's that?" and there's a ln inch and half hole in the seam! It's also a seam that is done before the ties were sewed in so there's no nice way to fix it and I expect it'll happen again unfortunately since it's a single thread holding the two halves of the shirt together. It's a shame too cause it's such a cute shirt and style.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gagnon

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for? Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, no need for review, it is just perfect in every sense, good materials, colors, fits as expected, it can cover your bottom if you feel insecure about your figure or maybe you don't want it to cover it because it gets in the way of being comfortable, both can be done without hassle in a minute or less! Want a sexy cleavage? Bam! zipper it down! Want to protect yourself from people judging you and staring at your chest? Bam! zipper it up!
customer_reviews.author: Estefania Ortegon

customer_reviews.title: Great length and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fairly flattering. It’s long enough to cover to about mini skirt length but can be adjusted into more of a shirt if you want to use it for active sports. Very good coverage from the sun and didn’t feel too heavy when it was wet.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C

customer_reviews.title: A good rash guard
customer_reviews.text: A good rash guard. Nice long sleeves, the rushing makes the rather longish shirt manageable, even flattering. I have used this shirt on two occasions in CA pool and beach and it has protected my fair skin well, even after hours in the pool. The zipper has a sharp end (thus no fabric covers the very end) and it rubs the chin if zipped all the way. Sizing is generous, I could have sized down. The white color is bright and pretty, looks nice with whatever color bikini bottoms. This rash guard isn't a bra or a bikini top, so you'll need a swimming suits/bikini under it.
customer_reviews.author: lizzyl

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great swim top for sun protection. Also, extremely flattering and sexy fit. I'm 5' 4" and 118 pounds and the extra small fit like a glove! Would order more (because it would make a great work out top too) but it seems to be in scarce supply.
customer_reviews.author: Frost

customer_reviews.title: Protect your skin.  Protect the reefs.  Look great while doing it.
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to be snorkeling and you are thinking of purchasing coral safe sunscreen, why don't you consider skipping the sunblock all together and covering yourself with a rash guard. Firstly, even if you are a mother whale like me, you will look great in this. Secondly, you will keep from getting sunburned even if you are in the sun all day and are pasty white like me. Thirdly, you won't destroy the reefs...
customer_reviews.author: Mom of the North

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, just what I wanted in a rash guard.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a river inner tubing day. We were on the water for 5 hours plus before and after time and I did not get any sunburn. Super cute and comfy. I thought at first that it might make me hot but it doesn't the material breaths.
customer_reviews.author: tweetydee

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and really looked nice on my body but the ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and really looked nice on my body but the best thing is that it was functional. This prevented a sunburn on by back during a long day of snorkeling. My friends were all burnt to a crisp. I felt and looked great! Very well made!!!! Quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Terranova

customer_reviews.title: these are great for snorkeling or for cover on extra sunny days ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great for snorkeling or for cover on extra sunny days in the water or on the beach... purchase your size or smaller as they stretch in the water. I returned the first one bc a friend said she didn't want them too tight. Tight is the best fit for these. I returned the small for an extra small.
customer_reviews.author: G H

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn this in the water yet, but the fit is nice and it looks great for the price. I ordered the XL and I'm 5'5" 165lbs. I have a belly, this helps camouflage it. I like how you can pull it down or wear it up. My only "con" and it's not really one, is that the fabric is thick. This may be a plus depending on what you need this for. I'd prefer lighter because I'm going to use it a the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie D.

customer_reviews.title: Runs large.
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2x small and I am usually just an xs or small and it fits really well. I wanted it to be tight though. I really like the drawstrings along the side to adjust the length of the shirt and the zip up the front is super cute and very practical. I got the white and it helped keep the sun off but didn't make me feel hot.
customer_reviews.author: Gennie

customer_reviews.title: Runs big. Size down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large based on what the size chart said I should buy. I wish I would've bought a small. It's big and there is a lot of fabric around the shoulders. But it did its job of keeping me from a sunburn. I even used it as an extra layer when we went up the mountain and it kept me warmer than I would've been without it.
customer_reviews.author: Clutterheart

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This is really comfortable and cute. I'm 5'6 and 135, but I have somewhat big shoulders and arms. The medium fits perfectly with room. When you let the pulls out on each side it's basically a dress/coverup on me. Highly suggest even though I haven't had it in the water yet.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyZf

customer_reviews.title: It's OK- Coolibar swim shirt is much better.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't just run a little small, it runs a lot small. I am a medium (sometimes small). I am not at all a big person. But due to the reviews, I ordered a large. It was super tight- I was disappointed. I own a Coolibar swim shirt and I like it so much better. It was more expensive, but the quality and fit are worth it. The Coolibar one, I have in a size medium and it fits like a medium. I wanted to like this, but I can't imagine what size I'd need to have it fit in a normal manner (not totally skin tight). Maybe it'd work for some, but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic swim shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear when I paddle board in the lake. It’s super cute and is fantastic for sum protection. Wicks water away quickly and is a gorgeous color (I have the hot pink).
customer_reviews.author: DukeGal19

customer_reviews.title: Fits fitted ..great material
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I ordered a medium but looks like a small...but it fits perfectly due to the stretching availability ...also I have enough material in length so I can wear it as a mini dress or pull the draw strings and wear it as a blouse cover...the material is durable and not see through! Definitely buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cantu, San Antonio, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, nicely made, nicely styled, very snug through the chest.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 165 lbs and ordered a medium. It's very snug through the chest and upper waist, fits nicely everywhere else. I'm pleased with the snug fit, I don't want it to billow around while swimming but I'm small chested and if you are a medium but have b cup or bigger this might be too tight for you. Nice fabric, nicely made, nicely styled. Lots of extra length in the body and sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: EbbyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! I thought it might be see through ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! I thought it might be see through but it worked great! The sleeves were a tad long and loose, but I am petite (under 5'4). I would choose something else if you really need a tight fitting rash guard, but as a swim coverup and to protect from the sun and be fashionable, I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Valle

customer_reviews.title: Order your normal size. Don't hesitate...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Comfy. Nice fit. Not too snug. I was concerned about the size and afraid a Large would be too small. Not an issue! I believe the Large fits like a typical US Large size 12/14. I suspect it would also fit fine if you're an 8/10... loose but not baggy. Likely a snug fit for a 16... maybe too tight if 18+.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful value
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sun shirt! It fits beautifully on a woman with curves! I wore around on vacation just as sun protection with a bra on sometimes underneath, other times with my swimsuit. The cut is very flattering and the pink is hot! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Dad

customer_reviews.title: Order any colored except white.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these. Blue &magenta I love then both!! White on the other hand was stained after being in a pool that was highly chlorinated and have tried every whitening agent/method out there, still stained.. ..
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing piece :)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit, great material, ordered both gellow and black and both are amazing. Don't doubt, for the price is really good. I am curvy so it rides up when its in dress mode, therefore I pulled down on it and so the side seam ripped :( but it can totally be fixed at home by hand, that is why I gave it 4 stars instead od 5, oh by the way, while I was at the Bahamas cruise I ran into another lady with the same but blue, she looked great and looked very comfy in it lol. I am 153lbs and a large fits perfect. A medium would have been way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Leonor

customer_reviews.title: but it is soft and I loved the fit
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn it once, but it is soft and I loved the fit. I'm 5'5", 125 lbs, and a large c cup and the small fit perfect. I have an athletic build, so usually the arms on small are tight, but I'm so glad I got this size because it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: good buy shopper

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a LG since I normally wear smalls and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a LG since I normally wear smalls and mediums and wanted it a little loose, but couldn't get over my head.It had no stretch at all and fabric was extremely thick which surprised me ,would never wear in summer. Without stretch I don't think could wear an xxlg and I'm 35 30 38 and wear as 3 jeans, med shirts, dress size 4 or 6. Hopes this helps someone else for fit. Returned and company refunded immediately so I am pleased with company just not fabric, may want to explain fabric better.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: I loved this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shirt, but the 2nd or 3rd time I washed it (in cold water and hung it up to dry) the seam started coming undone. Of course that was after the 30 day deadline to return it. I emailed the seller about it and they haven't responded. It's not a super expensive sun shirt, but I did expect it to last long than it did before I started falling apart. Look elsewhere for a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: tstilwell

customer_reviews.title: Buy all the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I like these rashguards so much, I ordered a second one and plan on getting a few more colors. I have the rose (hot pink) & black. They're slimming and provide wonderful protection. I am a nursing mom and the zipper makes it easy for breastfeeding discreetly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I bought this top
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this top! I got it for our trip to the Frio River. I wanted something that would guard me from the sun, yet look cute and be comfy in the water. I love the way it can be adjusted to wear short or long and the fabric was so soft! It feels like a marshmallow. I'm 5'7 and 170 lbs with a 36D chest and a medium fit me perfectly. I liked the coverage, but was still be able to show off my figure. I'm so happy with it. Just be careful with the zipper. I didn't take many pics, this all I could find.
customer_reviews.author: chavonnm

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’3 and weigh 124 lbs., and most of my weight is in my bust and rear...the smalls fit perfect. I can wear it as a top or a cover-up dress. I’m 46 yrs old, so I think this is more stylish than a lot of cover-ups for “older women.” I’ve worn it stand-up paddleboarding and it offers great sun protection out on the water. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! It fits just right everywhere
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! It fits just right everywhere. I usually wear a medium in shirts and that is what I ordered. The fabric is great quality. I bought it for snorkeling and I think it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SparklyMom

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit and the material keeps me cool in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first UV shirt to protect my tattoos when I'm working outside, but it quickly became my favorite shirt to wear to the beach and parks as well. This style is very flattering without being tight and the material keeps me comfortable even in the blazing hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: nice swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and quality of the shirt. I would recommend. It is small across the chest/shoulder so I would recommend order up one size. I usually wear a small and the medium fit well...not a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The turquoise one is gorgeous. What the other reviewers say is true. It adjusts well and you have some control on how it fits. The material is softer than I expected. I know from experience that the polyester in this fabric will help it last longer compared to other versions. Especially in chlorine. It's a little challenging and very heavy to take off after you've been in the water. But I like it so much that it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: Just like pictured! I’m 5’5, 38B, 33” waist, 170lbs pear-shaped so I ordered a M because I wanted it to fit snug and not have the sleeves be too long. Super stretchy and fit snug like I wanted. Don’t know how long it will last but feels good quality. Tips of tipper teeth are scratchy at the top so I’m going to find a way to melt them a little
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Im 4'11" 110lbs and i got the white XS and its perfect fit. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: A must have! Went to Hawaii in July and wore it on our kayaking, sun protection as promised, the fit is adjustable by loosening or tightening the string on both sides. Im 4'11" 110lbs and i got the white XS and its perfect fit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Wattalife

customer_reviews.title: Love this - comfortable & protected
customer_reviews.text: This is the first swim shirt I've ever used, and I loved it! I wore it every beach day while I was on Kauai for a week, in hot and humid August. It felt good against my skin - dry or wet and no sunburn. I liked the way I could adjust the length with the side cords. The zip at the neck made it easy to get on and off. The only small improvement I could suggest would be to finish the top edges of the nylon zipper with a piece of fabric because it feels rough on my neck when the neckline is open.
customer_reviews.author: Sue in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: It changed colors
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this but was very disappointed when it changed colors after going into the beach. It does protect you from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Rashguard
customer_reviews.text: I love the compression and it looks so good. The material is comfortable and flexible and great for movement. I probably could have gotten away with a size smaller, since the top is adjustable and this feels a little loose, but I'm in between a size 4 and 6 in shirts so that was my choice to make
customer_reviews.author: Nubia Clermont

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I took it down to Mexico thinking I would use it to sit on the beach. The fabric as others have noted is fairly thick - like workout pants. It was too thick to wear on the beach as it was so hot and humid. It might have been okay as a rash guard but I ended up never wearing it. I'll keep it since I think it is too late to return it. Maybe I'll be at some cooler beach??
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So Flattering yet Cool and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This shirt/tunic is so comfy yet attractive! It’s slimming and keeps you covered enough to go from beach to store unlike other coverups. I will be buying another color. I just can’t decide as I love the blue one so much. I wish they would make even more colors!
customer_reviews.author: C. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing based on reviews
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a medium. Ordered a large as I like my swimming shirts loose. Too small..so very tight. Zipper was broken. Arrived with no return label as you have to submit a request to seller in China a request to return and for a refund and they determine if buyer can return. Care instructions all in Chinese which is fine if you know who to care for a UV Sun Shirt. If washed incorrectly it damages it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fit just as I hoped - I ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fit just as I hoped - I got a large, and I usually wear a medium or large depending on how loose I want the top to be. I did not want this skin tight, so I went with the large. It's perfect! It's actually long enough to wear as a "tunic" and then you can pull up the side for a shortened version. Really cute!
customer_reviews.author: DMucha

customer_reviews.title: I bought a small size and it fits fine except for the length but I can adjust by ...
customer_reviews.text: I am petite size 5'1" and 110 lbs. I bought a small size and it fits fine except for the length but I can adjust by pulling on the side string to the lengh needed. The color is very nice. I hope that it will protect my back from sunburn when I snorkel but have not tried it yet until an upcoming trip this year to the caribbean
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: So cute and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and 115 size small fits great. The shorts that came free as a promo were a medium and they fit too. Excited to wear this. Would order more if they had short sleeve or three quarter sleeve in the same style with the ties.
customer_reviews.author: Chitowngirl

customer_reviews.title: The most perfect swim shirt ever
customer_reviews.text: The most perfect swim shirt ever. I need to protect my skin from the sun and this was amazing. Super cute and looks great, the shirring is perfect. It looks more like a dress than a rash guard, I can unzip the neck and gather the bottom and feel ultra cute, or zip it up all the way and lengthen it for protection. Great functionality and multi ways to wear it in just one simple garment!
customer_reviews.author: Bratpane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't survive the water
customer_reviews.text: I had this for like a month. Every time I wore it, it stretched out more. This was clearly not made to be worn in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Mann

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you super warm in pool
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect as the pool I go to are skimping on the water temp. I couldn’t believe it actually helped to keep me warm in pool. Fit is great. I went up a size to x-large as I don’t like anything clingy or skin tight. Arms are a bit long but doesn’t bother me one bit. Just roll them up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J

product_meta.title: ilishop Women's UV Sun Protection Long Sleeve Rash Guard Wetsuit Swimsuit Top
feature_bullets: Material: 82% chinlon + 18% spandex.(We improved the composition of the fabric to enhance comfortable sensation.)
Tighter fit, quick dry, comfortable and durable for long time use. High quality soft and breathable fabric.
Adjustable ruche sides for convertible length. Simply pull the cord to convert from a dress to shirt. Slim fit design for maximum comfort and coverage.
This rashguard can be used for Surfing, Diving, Yoga, Fitness, etc. Sun UPF UV Protection.
Note: Hand Wash with cold water. Don't use laundry detergent, it will destroy the Sun protection layer.
